sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"消失"之意。
means: vanish ： 语气强，指完全、往往是神秘而突然的消失，不留任何蛛丝马迹。
disappear ： 普通用词，强调从视线或脑海中消失。这消失可能是暂时的、突然的或永久的，视上下文而定。
evaporate ： 指像水蒸发时那样悄然逝去，也指某人悄悄地、突然退出或离去。

sentence.Network_en: With a wave of his hand, the magician made the rabbit vanish.
sentence.Network_cn: 魔术师手一挥兔子便不见了.

sentence.Network_en: All your troubles will vanish away when he returns safely.
sentence.Network_cn: 他平安回来后,你就无忧无虑了.

sentence.Network_en: "But where could they have gone?" he demanded. "They can't just vanish into thin air!"
sentence.Network_cn: “但是他们可能去哪里呢？”他追问道，“他们不可能就神秘消失了!”

英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... vanity n 空虚；虚荣心 vanish v 不见，消失 evanescence n 消失，幻灭.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: shortening of Old French e(s)vaniss-, lengthened stem of e(s)vanir, from Latin evanescere 'die away'

entry.def: If someone or something vanishes, they disappear suddenly or in a way that cannot be explained.

example.ex: He just vanished and was never seen again...
example.tran: 他就这么消失了，再也没人见到过他。

entry.def: If something such as a species of animal or a tradition vanishes, it stops existing.

example.ex: Near the end of Devonian times, thirty percent of all animal life vanished...
example.tran: 在泥盆纪末期，30％的动物物种都灭绝了。

example.ex: ...all the species of birds that had vanished from Iowa.
example.tran: 艾奥瓦州所有消失了的鸟类物种

means.word_mean: 1. get lost, especially without warning or explanation;

auth_sentence.content: They vanish from memory after they are written out.
auth_sentence.res_content: They vanish from memory after they are written out.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 高级的, 年老的, 先进的
stems_affixes.word_buile: advance[n.&v.前进, 提升]+ed表形容词→adj.高级的, 年老的, 先进的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 渐消失的, 易消散的, 会凋零的
stems_affixes.word_buile: e出+van空+escent开始……的→开始空出去的→渐消失的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 徒然的, 无益的, 虚荣的, 空虚的
stems_affixes.word_buile: vain=van空→adj.徒然的, 无益的, 虚荣的, 空虚的
van空+ity表名词→心里空空→虚荣心

stems_affixes.value_cn: 逐渐消失, 容易消失, 幻灭, 瞬息
stems_affixes.word_buile: e出+van空+escency开始→开始空出去→渐消失
ad向+van前卫,先锋+ce→n.&v.前进, 提升

means.word_mean: 消失, 突然不见,（莫名其妙地）突然消失

sentences.en: With a wave of his hand, the magician made the rabbit vanish.
sentences.cn: 魔术师手一挥兔子便不见了。

sentences.en: The smile vanished from her face.

means.word_mean: 不复存在, 绝迹,消亡

sentences.en: Many types of animal have now vanished from the earth.
sentences.cn: 许多动物物种现已从地球上绝迹。

jushi.english: Their fears vanished when the storm ended.
jushi.chinese: 暴风雨停止时,他们就不担心了。

jushi.english: The thief ran into the crowd and vanished.
jushi.chinese: 小偷跑进人群中不见了。

jushi.english: We saw the stars vanish and the dawn of a new day approach.
jushi.chinese: 我们看到星星逐渐消失,新的一天的黎明到来了。
